text: Morning Lads & Lasses, my name is Kane. I am a Front end developer currently working in a mixed role of dev / marketing. We use HubSpot a lot for the sales aspect of the business and as I feel having systems under the same roof is very handy, I am keen to explore other services HubSpot has to offer. I've rewritten this intro about 40 times so I'm going to press carriage return before I see something I want to change... (again!)
